name: DynamoDB Big Segment store
overview: Integrate with a persistent store for segments with over 15k targets or synced from external tools.
description: Integrate with a persistent store for segments with over 15k targets or synced from external tools. The DynamoDB Big Segment store syncs these LaunchDarkly segments with your DynamoDB.
author: LaunchDarkly

formVariables.name: DynamoDB table name
formVariables.description: Your DynamoDB table name. This table must already exist.

formVariables.name: AWS Region
formVariables.description: The AWS region where your DynamoDB is located.

formVariables.name: External Id
formVariables.description: Use this external ID when you create the IAM Role that LaunchDarkly will assume to manage your DynamoDB table.

formVariables.name: AWS Role ARN
formVariables.description: The AWS role Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that LaunchDarkly will assume to manage your DynamoDB table.
